tagline: We'll fix your car, no questions asked. Especially about those dents.
style: country jingle, friendly male voice, acoustic guitar
lyrics:
Big Earl's Auto, down on Route 9,
We'll fix your car and treat you fine!
Dents and scratches, we don't ask why,
Just bring it in, we'll make it fly!
Big Earl's Auto - no questions asked!
Open late, we've got your back!
suno_prompt: upbeat country radio jingle, male vocalist, acoustic guitar and light drums, friendly small-town vibe, 1990s local radio commercial style, 18 seconds
notes: Hints at mysterious late-night customers with unexplained vehicle damage
